sen.j: 中村 時蔵（なかむら ときぞう）は、歌舞伎役者の名跡。
sen.e: Tokizo NAKAMURA is a myoseki (professional name) of kabuki actor.
Tokizo NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.
Tokizo NAKAMURA is a Kabuki (traditional drama performed by male actors) actor's professional name.

sen.j: 屋号は萬屋錦之介萬屋（四代目までは播磨屋）。
sen.e: Its yago (stage family name) is Yorozuya Kinnosuke Yorozuya (it was Harimaya up to the fourth).
The stage family name is Yorozuya Kinnosuke YOROZUYA (it was Harimaya up to the fourth).
The stage family name is Yorozuya Kinnosuke YOROZUYA (it was Harimaya up to the fourth).

sen.j: 定紋は桐蝶、替紋は蔓片喰（つるかたばみ）。
sen.e: Its jomon (family crest) is Kiricho, Tsurukatabami.
The Jomon (family crest) is Kiricho (paulownia leaves arranged in the shape of a butterfly) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Tsuru Katabami (cuckooflower with vines).
sen.cmt: ウェブに合わせて、原文・訳文に「替紋は」「蔓片喰」を補足しました（ただし、ウェブ原文は変更されており、厳密には一致していません）。
sen.e: The Jomon (family crest) is Kiricho (paulownia leaves arranged in the shape of a butterfly) and the Kaemon (alternate personal crest) is Tsuru Katabami (cuckooflower with vines).

sen.j: 時蔵の名は初代の本名である波野時蔵に由来する。
sen.e: The name of Tokizo originated from Tokizo HATANO, the real name of the first.
The name of Tokizo originated from Tokizo Namino, the real name of the first.
sen.cmt: 用語集に合わせ読みを変えました。
sen.e: The name of Tokizo originated from Tokizo Namino, the real name of the first.

tit.cmt: 原文には 「中村歌六 (3代目)」とありましたが、リンク先の単語のようです。ウェブで確認すると用語が「初代 中村時蔵」となっており、本来はこちらの用語を使用していると思われますので、こちらを訳出し、原文修正しました。

sen.e: He later suceeded to Karoku NAKAMURA (the third).
He later succeeded to Karoku NAKAMURA (the third).
He later succeeded to Karoku NAKAMURA (the third).

His haimyo (also known as haimei, a kabuki actor's offstage name which can be used officially and privately) was Shido.
